paper_abstract: Given a finite poset P, let denote the largest size of a family of subsets of an n-set that does not contain P as a (weak) subposet. We employ a combinatorial method, using partitions of the collection of all full chains of subsets of the n-set, to give simpler new proofs of the known asymptotic behavior of , as n -> a, when P is the r-fork , the four-element N poset , and the four-element butterfly-poset .
paper_title: The partition method for poset-free families
